verses.verse: וַתִּקְרַ֜בְנָה <S%H7126><s%> vat-tik-Rav-nah Then came בְּנ֣וֹת <S%H1323><s%> be-Not the daughters צְלָפְחָ֗ד <S%H6765><s%> tze-la-fe-Chad, of Zelophehad בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son חֵ֤פֶר <S%H2660><s%> Che-fer of Hepher בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son גִּלְעָד֙ <S%H1568><s%> gil-'Ad of Gilead בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son מָכִ֣יר <S%H4353><s%> ma-Chir of Machir בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh, of Manasseh לְמִשְׁפְּחֹ֖ת <S%H4940><s%> le-mish-pe-Chot of the families מְנַשֶּׁ֣ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh of Manasseh בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son יוֹסֵ֑ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef; of Joseph וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh and these שְׁמ֣וֹת <S%H8034><s%> she-Mot and these [are] the names בְּנֹתָ֔יו <S%H1323><s%> be-no-Tav, of his daughters מַחְלָ֣ה <S%H4244><s%> mach-Lah Mahlah נֹעָ֔ה <S%H5270><s%> no-'Ah, Noah וְחָגְלָ֥ה <S%H2295><s%> ve-cha-ge-Lah and Hoglah וּמִלְכָּ֖ה <S%H4435><s%> u-mil-Kah and Milcah וְתִרְצָֽה׃ <S%H8656><s%> ve-tir-Tzah. and Tirzah
